content:
1. Who among us will be there?

  2. Do we have any specific plans? Or vague plans?

  3. @Rien Wertheim I believe (as I said on Twitter to FirelyTeam) we should publicize the four finalists who are coming. Are there plans to do this? Can I help?
I will not be there. Who are the four finalists?

Ha ha ha hey @Rien Wertheim we dropped the ball on this - it didn't occur to the team that we should plan on openly celebrating the nominees. I'll let Debi know privately but we need to announce it in a non-leaky fashion, eh?
Yes, we will. We just added it to the website. Waiting for the finalists to approve.

@Rien Wertheim I just reviewed the whole schedule ... am I correct that this one item labeled "Patient Track," 14:00-14:40 Wednesday, is the whole "patient track," and it's the 4 ten minute pitches? If so it will surely need to be more than 40 minutes, as people come and go.
